telemetry
Class TelemetryCore

java.lang.Object
  telemetry.TelemetryCore
Direct Known Subclasses:
CubeTelemetry, DockTelemetry, TestTelemetry
public class TelemetryCore
extends java.lang.Object

TelemetryCore

This is the core telemetry class. It provide methods for reading in a telemetry XML configuration file and setting up a client and server.

Since:
2015-03-25
Version:
1.0
Author:
Matt Thorne

Returns:

telemetryAction

protected java.lang.String telemetryAction(java.lang.String recievedMessage)
Method to be overridden by a sub class to handle telemetry messages. Default behavior is to echo the message sent

Parameters:
recievedMessage - Message recieved from telemetry partner
Returns:
the response to be sent to the partner

getSignalData

protected java.lang.String getSignalData(int signal)
Retrieves the telemtry signal data component specified by the parameter

Parameters:
signal - Component to be read 1 = Signal Level db 2 = Signal Frequency
Returns:
String representation of the signal data

distanceFromPartner

protected java.lang.Double distanceFromPartner(double signalLevelInDb,
                                               double freqInMHz)
This method is used to calculate the distance to the partner telemetry module

Parameters:
signalLevelInDb - Double precision value of the measured signal level in decibels
freqInMHz - Double precision value of the measured signal frequency
